column4: anyone know how to install the console-data or kbd packages? I get 404's everywhere
do a  sudo apt-get update  and try again
are you sure you have the correct package names?
yep... I find them in apt-cache search
lsb_release -a  <-- what version does that result in?
oh my... I would highly recommend upgrading to gutsy and then hardy, if you can
feisty does not have supported packages like that anymore
are you catching any 404's with that?
no... but dist-upgrade doesn't really do anything either... it says 0 packages were installed
then the system is fully up to date. if you want newer packages, you need to upgrade the entire distribution.
looks like you've fallen behind.... got a cd burner?
yeah, it was a fiesty fawn, but bambi got hungry...
